title: Online and Free file transfer - secure and Quick
meta: Share files directly, quickly and securely with our free FileDropShare. We provide the simplest way to transfer your big files without requiring any sign-up.
h1: Send and Receive Large Files Directly & Securely
h2: Secure & Quick Online File Transfer – Share Large Files Directly via Link, No Server Upload

featureHighlights.title: Direct File Transfer
description: Share your file online directly from one device to another without involving any server by just copy paste a link or Qr code.

featureHighlights.title: No File Size Limit
description: There is no file size limit for sharing files as We don’t upload your files on any server.

featureHighlights.title: Data Security
description: Ensure 100% security and privacy for your data during online file transfers with our tool, as we don’t upload your file to a server for transfer.

featureHighlights.title: User-Friendly
description: Our file transfer web tool is easy to use, allowing you to send large files in just a few steps—without any complexity.

featureHighlights.title: Free to use
description: No charges for transferring large files between devices. You can easily share huge files without requiring sign-up or registration.

featureHighlights.title: Cross-Platform
description: Files can be shared between different operating systems and devices, such as Windows, macOS, and iOS.

howTo.heading: How can i send large files directly from one device to another?
steps: Select your file from your device on simply clicking the 'Add File' button.
As soon as file uploaded, we generate a link with QR code for transfer.
Share the link or scan the QR code from another device to complete the transfer directly.

faqs.question: What is peer to peer?
faqs.answer: Peer-to-peer (P2P) is a type of networking that helps users send their files directly to other users without uploading and downloading them on a server, in no time.

faqs.question: What is a file sharing service?
faqs.answer: A file-sharing service plays a vital role when you need to transfer very large files quickly without physical storage available on devices. You can send, receive, and store large files by sharing links or QR codes for these files.

faqs.question: Is file sharing safe?
faqs.answer: As there is no need to upload files for transfer on server, our service works on peer-to-peer networking, which does not involve any server. Instead, it works directly between two clients. So, File sharing is absolutly secure and safe.

faqs.question: How can i transfer files from phone to computer?
faqs.answer: Select files from your mobile, and our tool will generate a link that you can share with your computer.

faqs.question: Do I need to upload large files to share them?
faqs.answer: No, you don’t need to upload large files for sharing. You can simply copy and share a link or QR code to transfer the file directly.

faqs.question: How can i send and receive big files with not enough storage on device?
faqs.answer: If you don’t have enough storage on your device to store or receive large files, our online file transfer platform provides a solution. You can transfer files using only links.
